summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5368 for the construction of a trunk sewer and subsewers to be known as the Seward Park Trunk Sewer, along an easement for sewer purposes to be acquired across park property, from Juneau Street to East Margin of Lakeside Avenue South; Lakeside Avenue South, from said easement to the Government Meander Line along the shore of Lake Washington; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; under Ordinance No. 64070, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
